metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6533 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Icinga 2.x through 2.8.1. By editing theinit.conf file, Icinga 2 can be run as root. Following this the program canbe used to run arbitrary code as root. This was fixed by no longer usinginit.conf to determine account information for any root-executed code (alarger issue than CVE-2017-16933).

criterions.comment: icinga: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
